input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: 'unlimeat' is protein rich, 100% plant-based, cholesterol free, with comfortable texture and no artificial ingredients.

Tone: descriptive, friendly

Audience: whole society

additives: authentic korean bbq and spicy seasonings

benefits:since it is plant-based, you can avoid problems related to eating a lot of meat
sentences: Looking for a delicious and healthy alternative to meat? Look no further than unlimeat! This protein-rich, plant-based dish is cholesterol free and contains no artificial ingredients.

Unlimeat is a protein rich, 100% plant-based, cholesterol free, with comfortable texture and no artificial ingredients. It is a great alternative to meat, and it is also authentic korean bbq and spicy seasonings.

Looking for a healthy, plant-based protein that doesn't taste like cardboard? Look no further than unlimeat! This delicious, protein-rich food is 100% plant-based, cholesterol free, and contains no artificial ingredients.
